document.full_text: the 2006 movie "superman returns" was supposed to reignite the comic-book character for big-screen audiences and make a star out of unknown actor brandon routh. while critics praised the film, it underwhelmed at the box office, earning $391 million worldwide.
document.title: "superman returns" director offers mea culpa
